page.title: 06EDUCATION 2
page.content: {AN INDEPENDANT SCHOOL One of the local{Roman Catholic } Convent schools has been established for 31 years.Most of the pupils have a long way to travel.They have private education because of their home beliefs.{Private education}is still thriving in this area.Private education is{supposedly}more caring and understanding than that of a state school. Boys are not allowed to go to any convent schools after the age of 5 years,they have to go to an ordinary first school.The Governors feel the girls should give their full attention to their school_work rather than boys. There is also a{non denominational} private school in the area. In Surrey roughly{20% of children attend private {schools.}This is much higher than the national average.
